title: MythicMobs - 伪装报错
author: ゞ側灬脸〆
txt_content:
[15:39:43 警告]: [MythicMobs] Task #8172 for MythicMobs v4.3.2-SNAPSHOT generated an exception
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.Disguise.setWatcher(Disguise.java:858) ~[?:?]

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:675) [Spigot-1.11.2.jar:git-Spigot-7d78b81-7e19325]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:574) [Spigot-1.11.2.jar:git-Spigot-7d78b81-7e19325]

                                                                                     怪物配置   
cs:
  Mobtype: Husk
  Display: '&7[&b异化村民&7]'
  Health: 100
  Damage: 2
  Disguise:
    Type: PLAYER
    Player: '&7[&b异化村民&7]'
    Skin: Verbogen
  Skills:
  DamageModifiers:
  - FIRE_TICK 0
  Faction: Undead
  AIGoalSelectors:
  - 0 clear
  - 1 meleeattack
  - 2 randomstroll
  AITargetSelectors:
  - 0 clear
  - 1 hurtbytarget
  Modules:
    ThreatTable: true
  Equipment:
  - 浔州城卫兵帽子:4
  - 浔州城卫兵衣服:3
  - 浔州城卫兵裤子:2

顺便求一份 配置好的怪物 玩家伪装

replies.author: penjing
replies.txt_content:
Disguise:
    Type: player
    Skin: COW
    Player: 牛人
    Burning: false
    Blocking: true
    Invisible: false
    ShowName: false
    Sneaking: true
    Sprinting: true
    ModifyBoundingBox: false   这样 格式 建议你用付费版
